thread.title: Awesome Boutique Hotel - Heart of Greenwich Village
thread.title_full: Awesome Boutique Hotel - Heart of Greenwich Village - Review of The Marlton Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Daniel B
title: Awesome Boutique Hotel - Heart of Greenwich Village
text:
This is a gem of a hotel, wonderful service, atmospheric lounge, and a great location set in the hear of Greenwich Village, within walking distance of the East Village, or shoot up 5th Avenue for a nice little walk to the Flat Iron district. Also within walking distance of the High Line and Chelsea ... The place has a great vibe and coupled with awesome service and the greatest location possible, The Marlton is a real winner ...
Room Tip: Really cant' say . See more room tips
